title: New Cannondale Jekyll hides shock, adds size-specific high pivot suspension w/ ‘Guidler’
content:
It’s hard to believe it’s already been four years since the Cannondale Jekyll had its last major face lift. The 2018 model was first launched only as a 170/165mm travel bike with 27.5″ wheel – it wasn’t until the 2019 model that the wheels got bigger (though the travel grew smaller). Looking ahead, the new […]

The post New Cannondale Jekyll hides shock, adds size-specific high pivot suspension w/ ‘Guidler’ appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
